mapper.select: SELECT *, CASE WHEN IFNULL(user_menu.auth_id,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end AS checks FROM auth_menu LEFT JOIN user_menu ON auth_menu.id = user_menu.auth_id AND user_menu.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY auth_menu.id order BY auth_menu.id;
SELECT *,IF(apm.menu_id is not NULL, '1' , '0') checks FROM auth_menu am left JOIN auth_post_menu apm ON apm.menu_id = am.id AND apm.post_id = #{postId} WHERE am.is_menu = 1
